analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#513-528):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#525-527)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#359-413):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#367-381)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#381-384)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#400-405)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#400)

	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#381-384)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#428-447):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#430-433)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#439-441)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#441-442)

	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#437-439)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#668-698) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#683-698)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#682-698)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#214-216)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#198)
MintableToken.mintingFinished should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0x98ee18d7a1f7510b78b36f5a16471c7cd0c1c531.sol#882-883)
